personal.name: Sreya M Nambiar
personal.title: Pre-Final Year Student
personal.description: Passionate about creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. Let's build something amazing together.

about.heading: Who I Am
paragraphs: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer with a love for creating elegant solutions to complex problems. With expertise in modern web technologies, I bring ideas to life through clean code and intuitive user interfaces.

My journey in tech started with curiosity and has evolved into a deep passion for building digital experiences that make a difference. I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest trends in technology.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

projects.title: AutoSupport Ticket System
projects.description: An intelligent automated ticket support system that classifies and prioritizes support tickets based on keyword analysis. Frontend developed and hosted in Vercel, backend uses Motia and hosted in Railway.

projects.title: Sign Language Recognition for Deaf Individuals
projects.description: An innovative application designed to help deaf individuals communicate through sign language recognition technology, making communication more accessible and inclusive.

projects.title: InclusiveHub - Accessibility Platform
projects.description: An accessibility platform that combines Gemini AI for speech-to-text functionality with Google Maps API for location-based services. Features AI chatbot, voice commands, and nearby search capabilities to help users find accessible places. Won at MLH Hackathon.

projects.title: FinSakhi - Financial Education Platform
projects.description: An edutech investment platform designed for rural communities to promote financial literacy and inclusion. Features voice-first finance in local languages, personalized financial insights, gamified savings, emotional AI companion, skill and livelihood matching, community investment circles, and a digital financial twin.

projects.title: Malware Detection & File Upload Security
projects.description: A cybersecurity application that detects malware and identifies file upload vulnerabilities. When users upload images or files, the system analyzes them for potential security threats and vulnerabilities, providing detailed security assessments to prevent malicious uploads.

projects.title: MicroZard - Weed Detection System
projects.description: An innovative AI-powered weed detection system combining software and hardware to help farmers identify and manage weeds efficiently. A team project developed over 3 years to improve agricultural productivity through computer vision and machine learning.

description: During my internship, I developed an Inventory Management System using FastAPI and PostgreSQL as the database and explored AWS services and CloudWatch for performance monitoring and deployment insights.

workExperience.company: Sakthi Veera Green Energy Pvt ltd
description: Developed a grant and loan web application where users can find various government grants and loans related to startups in India. Built using React for the frontend and Node.js with Google Sheets API for fetching the records from the Excel sheet.

achievements.title: Smart India Hackathon
achievements.fullDescription: Won the prestigious Smart India Hackathon 2024, competing against thousands of teams nationwide. Built an AntiDoping Edtech platform - an innovative solution providing awareness and education about anti-doping through our platform, addressing real-world problems with technology.

achievements.title: 5-Day Cybersecurity Bootcamp
achievements.fullDescription: Attended the Cyber Security bootcamp at Anna University Chennai, organized by Information Security Education Awareness (ISEA) by MeitY

achievements.title: Training Sessions
achievements.fullDescription: Conducted comprehensive training sessions for junior students and freshers in Python and C programming languages. Delivered both online and offline classes, helping beginners build strong programming fundamentals and develop practical coding skills.

achievements.title: Infosys Techzooka
achievements.fullDescription: Secured 3rd Runner Up position at Infosys Techzooka 2024, showcasing innovative technical solutions. We pitched our project Microzard - a weed detection system designed to help farmers identify and manage weeds efficiently, leveraging AI and computer vision to improve agricultural productivity.

achievements.title: Dpurpose - Anna University
achievements.fullDescription: Presented and pitched MicroZard project at Anna University's Dpurpose event. Demonstrated technical expertise and problem-solving capabilities to judges and industry experts.

achievements.title: UI Figma Design Competition
achievements.fullDescription: Won 3rd place in the Figma Fusion PixelPlus Gaming Web Development Workshop competition. Designed a comprehensive Fortnite-themed gaming website with modern UI/UX principles, creating an immersive user experience with sleek aesthetics and intuitive navigation.

achievements.title: College Hackathons & Symposiums
achievements.description: Won and participated in various hackathons
achievements.fullDescription: Actively participated and won prizes in multiple college hackathons and technical symposiums. Gained extensive experience in competitive coding, teamwork, and rapid prototyping.
